org.apache.log4j

Class NDC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.NDC

  • public class NDC
extends Object
    A log4j's NDC implemented in terms of SLF4J MDC primitives.
    Since:
    SLF4J 1.6.0
